TopicTitle: How to tell how many crew on board?

Articles.Content:
I have a large, laggy ship, with a large crew capacity.

Is there an easy way to find out how many crew are on board?

Edited May 9, 2014 by SSSPutnik
Map view and the info/crew icons on the right, I guess. But I can't check it right now.
That shows crew, but not total, just have to add them up. Thanks Kasuha.
MechJeb has vessel info that will tell you maximum number of crew members ship will hold, as well as the number of crew members currently onboard.

I know you use mods, I think Crew Manifest gives a total in each crew carrying part, which would make the sums easier.

What are you doing with all the crew? Sending a ship to invade colonize somewhere?

Where in MJ does it state crew aboard? I can only see capacity.

RIC: Kethane variant of Jool 5. Landing 25+ at moons in bases, 5 return to Kerbin, extra for shuttle piloting, some for remaining space station, (5 min so I can run RemoteTech local command center).

Ambitious plan!

I know MechJeb calculates some things that aren't in the default displays. I add part count to Vessel Info, for instance. I'm not sure about actual crew count, but if you poke around the window editor you might find it.
